text: The Bayside High love affair of Zack Morris and Kelly Kapowski entertained a whole generation of youngsters. And now Saved By The Bell couple Mark - Paul Gosselaar and Tiffani Thiessen will enjoy a long - awaited reunion when he appears on the new series of her hit cookery show Dinner At Tiffani's. Unfortunately for their more hardcore of fans, the beefcake will be bringing along his real - life wife Catriona McGinn for the gay affair. Aloha : Saved By The Bell couple Mark - Paul Gosselaar and Tiffani Thiessen are to reunite on her cooking show Announcing the exciting guest appearance to Us Weekly, the 42 - year - old said :'I believe the most wanted and anticipated one.
